template <typename (unknown)>
struct vsip::impl::Is_view_type
File: ../../../vsip/core/view_traits.hpp

Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid view.

Views should provide specializations similar to:
template <> struct Is_view_type<Matrix> { typedef void type; }; template <> struct Is_view_type<const_Matrix> { typedef void type; };
Specializations:
Is_view_type<Vector<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<const_Vector<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<lazy_Vector<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<Matrix<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<const_Matrix<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<lazy_Matrix<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<Tensor<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<const_Tensor<T,Block>>
Is_view_type<lazy_Tensor<T,Block>>
-Public Data members
const bool value = false
